medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began around 2 AM today. Patient was awoken from sleep with severe, sharp epigastric pain, followed by severe nausea and vomiting. The pain was unrelenting until narcotics were given in the emergency room. Patient had episodes of vomiting about three weeks ago with some abdominal pain that resolved spontaneously. Currently reports feeling much improved with no pain or nausea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. GERD 2. PVD 3. Hypertension 4. Hyperlipidemia 5. BPH 6. Anxiety
